data.name: 0000 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Do you think Nagato's got a strong sixth sense?

data.name: 0001 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I heard from Kyon that you said something along those lines.

data.name: 0002 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: To tell you the truth, I'm not sure why, but something does give me that impression.

data.name: 0003 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Doesn't it seem like she has some kind of mysterious power that others don't?

data.name: 0004 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I wonder… I think she's quite normal though…

data.name: 0005 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That's wrong, Mikuru.

data.name: 0006 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: She joined the SOS Brigade, so there abso- lutely must be something special about her.

data.name: 0007 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: I definitely hope there is!

data.name: 0008 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: U-ummm…

data.name: 0009 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Mikuru—are you interested in sensing the supernatural?

data.name: 0010 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: N-no! I'm not interested!

data.name: 0011 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Ah… Mikuru, there's a dimly glowing hand on your shoulder…

data.name: 0012 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #SK0Eeeeekkkkkk?!

data.name: 0013 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Nah, it's just a joke! A joke! You're so cute after all, Mikuru~

data.name: 0014 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: P-please don't scare me like that!

data.name: 0015 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: If this were Yuki, she'd have no reaction at all for sure.

data.name: 0016 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Did you know? Spirits and ghosts are weak against people who aren't afraid of them.

data.name: 0017 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-is that true…?

data.name: 0018 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: It seems like if someone is brave enough, or has a lot of guts, they just get left alone.

data.name: 0020 (279.ja) KYON_SIS (妹)
data.value: But you're always afraid, aren't you~

data.name: 0021 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Errr, is that so…

data.name: 0022 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: And that's why even though it's not related to sensing the supernatural, I'll count on that.

data.name: 0023 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: When the time comes, you won't be able to enjoy unnatural phenomena if you're spineless.

data.name: 0024 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: I-I don't think you have to enjoy it.

data.name: 0025 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: That won't do. As an SOS Brigade member you always have to stay cool in the heat of it.

data.name: 0026 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: That's definitely impossible…

data.name: 0027 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Next time, let's do special training in a haunted house or something!

data.name: 0028 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Ehhhh?! S-special training?!

data.name: 0029 (279.ja) HARUHI (ハルヒ)
data.value: Yup. It's a great idea, if I do say so myself. That slacker Kyon can come with us as well!

data.name: 0030 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: S-surely not…?!

data.name: 0031 (279.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: #P06I've bought us some time, but… I'm not sure how I feel about this, Kyon.
